about_the_game:
MyDiscord:



This is a fantasy rogue-like action game where you select a faction from the Alliance, Orcs, Undead, and Demons, gather your heroes and armies to march onto the battlefield, carve a bloody path in a turbulent world, conquer territories and defeat opponents, and ultimately become the overlord of the land.
This is a fast-paced and thrilling third-person fantasy action game that provides a massive melee experience, integrating elements of construction, tower defense, roguelike, social interaction, and more.

Heroes and Armies
You will have four completely different factions to choose from, each with multiple heroes who have unique skill trees based on their positions.

Epic Battles

You will experience intense and brutal map encounters, siege battles, city defense battles, and more, and this game fully supports SteamDeck.

Defense
You must protect your resources and important buildings and can establish enough defense works on your fortress to do so.

Reasonable Management
You will manage your own fortress.

Player Interaction
Players can scout the fortress layout or attack the fortress.

Random World
Every game starts at a randomly generated special point on a random map, providing a fresh experience every time.

This is a fast-paced and thrilling third-person fantasy action game that provides a massive melee experience, integrating elements of construction, tower defense, roguelike, social interaction, and more.

movies.name: Heroos and overlord  宣传片激斗版

name: Heroes and Overlord

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: standard audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a Fantasy action game where you can choose a faction from different races such as the Alliance, Orcs, Undead, and Demons. Gather your heroes and army and rush to the battlefield,conquer territories and defeat opponents to ultimately become the ruler of the land.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Italian
